screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 100, textsize[1] + 100) offset = 20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 100 wsizex = textsize[0] + 100 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex = 600 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex - 20, 70) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 100, textsize[1] + 100) offset = 20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 100 wsizex = textsize[0] + 100 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex = 600 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex - 20, 70) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: VuplusAuthenticity
screen.title: Return the Love Event (only for genuine box)

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (20, 0), size = (480, 30), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the essid MultiContentEntryText(pos = (20, 29), size = (200, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 5), # index 5 is the interface MultiContentEntryText(pos = (220, 30), size = (175, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # index 0 is the encryption MultiContentEntryText(pos = (500, 0), size = (240, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 0 is the signal MultiContentEntryText(pos = (500, 29), size = (240, 30), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 0 is the maxrate MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (0, 0), size = (0, 0), png = 6), # index 6 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 26),gFont("Regular", 24)], "itemHeight": 60 }
